A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The gift of reboots and 7th sequels has now become it's curse. Audiences are now writing their own imaginings and theories to the point where they can't just sit back and enjoy a movie as it unfolds.\n\nTLJ was beautiful visually\, told a lovely story of good\, evil and what's between\, and had tons of surprises...which is what many fanboys hated..because they had already written their own script.
